layout.text:
A new approach to horse racing tips.
A VIP Tipping Service Limited to 100 members only.
The problem with many existing tipping services is that the tips are given to you as a "set and forget" list of tips. The '"tipster" often does their form analysis days before race day with little regard to critical race day factors such as weather, track condition, fixed odds price, track bias, race day scratching that could impact speed of the race etc.
This is fundamentally flawed on many fronts.
At BetAnalyst our final list of "potential" selections are typically done on race day morning - after scratchings.
Our sophisticated and proprietary computerised horse and form analysis systems and algorithms analyse every race run on every race day in Australia to identify horses that satisfy our very stringent and proprietary horse selection criteria. 
No human could undertake this level of analysis (in a timely manner).
It is only through the power of our algorithms and computerised systems that we can undertake this massive task.
